name: Bounce Queen
description:
You play as the Bounce Queen! User her strong legs and an unbreaking determination to reach the top of the royal watchtower to keep a watchful eye over her kingdom! Or fall... again... and again.
This game is best played in fullscreen.

Some Apple devices may have issues with resolution scaling.

This game was made by Benedikt Aron Sigurþórsson, Birkir Finnbogi H Arndal, Antonio Kristófer Salvador, and Rúnar Örn Friðriksson for Reykjavík University's Advanced Game Design & Development course of 2022, taught by Steingerður Lóa Gunnarsdóttir,  Greta Luise Hoffman, and Guðni Natan Gunnarsson.

This was our final assignment where we were supposed to make an original game in a short amount of time.
